title: KhaZix Voiceover bug
body:
Pretty simple bug I'm surprised that noone's noticed before: Khazix now says most of his evolved ability voice lines (Like "Die Running") even when he hasn't evolved any abilities. 

pls fix rito game unplayable

replies.body:
Hey Phhase - 

We actually changed how Kha'Zix's VO triggers several patches ago. This is working as intended. All evolved lines were actually broken and not playing - so we just put all evolved lines in his default attack and moves.

Hope this clears things up. ^-^
